statements: SELECT * FROM Ecotourism_Feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, ecotourist_name, rating FROM Ecotourism_Feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM Ecotourism_Feedback WHERE ecotourist_name='Alice';
SELECT ecotourist_name, date_submitted FROM Ecotourism_Feedback WHERE rating = 5;
SELECT ecotourist_name, COUNT(*) AS total_feedbacks FROM Ecotourism_Feedback GROUP BY ecotourist_name;
SELECT * FROM Ecotourism_Feedback WHERE rating = 5 ORDER BY date_submitted DESC, ecotourist_name ASC
SELECT ecotourist_name, review FROM Ecotourism_Feedback WHERE rating > 3
SELECT feedback_id, ecotourist_name, date_submitted FROM Ecotourism_Feedback WHERE date_submitted BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY feedback_id ASC
SELECT MAX(rating) AS highest_rating, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM Ecotourism_Feedback GROUP BY ecotourist_name HAVING AVG(rating) > 3
SELECT * FROM Ecotourism_Feedback WHERE feedback_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT id, comment, rating FROM feedback WHERE ecotourist_id = 1;
SELECT name, location, start_date FROM initiatives WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, name, location, start_date, end_date FROM initiatives WHERE location LIKE '%forest%';
SELECT id, initiative_id, rating FROM feedback ORDER BY rating DESC, initiative_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 4
SELECT id, name, location, start_date FROM initiatives WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT ecotourist_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM feedback GROUP BY ecotourist_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT f.comment, i.name FROM feedback f JOIN initiatives i ON f.initiative_id = i.id
SELECT MAX(rating) AS highest_rating, MIN(rating) AS lowest_rating FROM feedback
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT tourist_name, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT initiative_name, success_rate FROM initiative ORDER BY success_rate DESC;
SELECT review_text, reviewer_name, review_date FROM review WHERE reviewer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT tourist_name, feedback_text, visit_date FROM feedback WHERE visit_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT tourist_name, feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM review WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY review_date ASC;
SELECT initiative_name, success_rate FROM initiative WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' AND end_date > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY success_rate DESC;
SELECT tourist_name, feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE visit_date >= '2022-01-01' AND visit_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY tourist_name ASC;
SELECT reviewer_name, rating, review_date FROM review WHERE rating < 3 ORDER BY review_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT id, ecotourist_id, date, rating FROM feedback ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ecotourist WHERE country='Costa Rica';
SELECT name, location FROM ecotourism_initiative WHERE id=1;
SELECT * FROM initiative_feedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY initiative_id ASC, rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT ecotourist.name, ecotourist.country, feedback.rating FROM ecotourist INNER JOIN feedback ON ecotourist.id = feedback.ecotourist_id;

SELECT initiative_feedback.rating, initiative_feedback.comment, ecotourism_initiative.name FROM initiative_feedback JOIN ecotourism_initiative ON initiative_feedback.initiative_id = ecotourism_initiative.id;

SELECT ecotourist.name, ecotourist.email, ecotourism_initiative.location, initiative_feedback.rating FROM ecotourist INNER JOIN initiative_feedback ON ecotourist.id = initiative_feedback.feedback_id INNER JOIN ecotourism_initiative ON initiative_feedback.initiative_id = ecotourism_initiative.id;

SELECT feedback.date, ecotourist.name AS ecotourist_name, ecotourism_initiative.name AS initiative_name FROM feedback JOIN ecotourist ON feedback.ecotourist_id = ecotourist.id JOIN ecotourism_initiative ON feedback.id = initiative_feedback.feedback_id;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT tourist_id, name, nationality FROM tourist;
SELECT initiative_id, initiative_name, location, start_date FROM ecotourism_initiatives;
SELECT suggestion_id, feedback_id, suggestion FROM improvement_suggestions ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, initiative_id, improvement_suggestion_id FROM initiative_feedback WHERE initiative_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT tourist_id, name, email FROM tourist WHERE nationality='USA';
SELECT review, rating FROM feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT initiative_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM ecotourism_initiatives WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT feedback.feedback_id, tourist.name, feedback.review, improvement_suggestions.suggestion FROM feedback JOIN tourist ON feedback.tourist_id = tourist.tourist_id JOIN improvement_suggestions ON feedback.feedback_id = improvement_suggestions.feedback_id;
